resources.string: Welcome to your library! To add flashcard sets, you can:

Simple Flashcards Plus can automatically back up your data, so you can save it to your Google Drive or export it to another device. Want to try it out? If you don\'t want to right now, you can find this feature in the settings menu.
If you want to give Simple Flashcards Plus a darker color scheme, you can turn on dark mode. Want to try it now? If not, that\'s okay, you can turn it on or off at any time from the settings menu.
You do not have any flashcard sets that match your search.

Hey, it looks like you\'re a frequent user of Simple Flashcards Plus! If you have a couple seconds, please rate this app in the Play Store. Every rating goes a long way towards motivating us to continue improving this app!
Studying Is Best Done In Groups!

If you have a friend who could use an awesome flashcards experience, please share Simple Flashcards with them. Our goal is to help as many people as possible with our work, which is why all of our apps are free and every new user puts a smile on our faces.
Get them from nearby study buddies
Are you sure you want to delete your flashcard set %s?
This flashcard set currently has no flashcards to browse. Use the edit button to add some!
You need at least 2 flashcards in a set to take a quiz for it. Use the edit button to add more!
Tell us what you\'re searching for.
Sorry, but your Android device doesn\'t support speech recognition.
We couldn\'t recognize what you said. Please try again.
